Problem
‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ
If you ever wanted to...

‚Ä¢ Share a section of a YouTube video with someone - instead of the whole video.
‚Ä¢ Save or bookmark sections of YouTube videos.
‚Ä¢ Create memes by sharing very short sections of videos.
‚Ä¢ Share many sections of a very long video.

Solution
‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ
This extension adds an "End at" checkbox and input under the "Start at" one in the Share dialog next to the YouTube video.
This way you can get a link to a section of the video, by selecting the "Start at" and "End at" times. When the link is opened, the video starts and stops at the specific times you have selected ! üéâ


Advantages over YouTube Clip feature:
‚Ä¢ There is no need to have a YouTube creator (google) account and to be logged in to create a clip.
‚Ä¢ There is no 5-60 seconds restriction on clip duration. The clip can be as short or long as you like.

Limitations:
‚Ä¢ Does not work if the creator has deactivated embedding for the video.
‚Ä¢ Does not work on Premiere and Live videos.


Source code: https://github.com/elias-pap/youtube-share-clip üöÄ
Report issues: https://github.com/elias-pap/youtube-share-clip/issues
